org.linqs.psl.grounding

Interface GroundRuleStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AtomRegisterGroundRuleStore, MemoryGroundRuleStore

    public interface GroundRuleStore
    Container for a set of GroundRules.

    Since this container uses set semantics, no two GroundRules that are equal can be stored in it. If a Rule wants to add another GroundRule that does the same thing over the same GroundAtoms, then it should retrieve the original GroundRule and modify it.

    • Method Detail

      • addGroundRule

        void addGroundRule(GroundRule rule)
        Adds a GroundRule to this store. The behavior on what to do when a rule is already added is up tothe implementation. It may ignore it or throw an exception.
        Parameters:
        rule - the GroundRule to add

      • close

        void close()
        Release any memory held by the store. A store that has been closed cannot be used again.

      • removeGroundRule

        void removeGroundRule(GroundRule rule)
        Removes a GroundRule from this store. Check with the implementation on the runtime.
        Parameters:
        rule - the GroundRule to remove
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if rule is not in this store

      • removeGroundRules

        void removeGroundRules(Rule rule)
        Removes all GroundRules that was instantiated by a given rule. Check with the implementation on the runtime.
        Parameters:
        rule - the originator of the ground rules

      • containsGroundRule

        boolean containsGroundRule(GroundRule rule)
        Checks whether a GroundRule is in this store. Check with the implementation on the runtime.
        Parameters:
        rule - the GroundRule to check
        Returns:
        true if rule is in this store

      • getGroundRules

        Iterable<GroundRule> getGroundRules()
        Returns:
        every GroundRule in this store

      • getCompatibilityRules

        Iterable<WeightedGroundRule> getCompatibilityRules()
        Returns:
        every WeightedGroundRule in this store

      • getConstraintRules

        Iterable<UnweightedGroundRule> getConstraintRules()
        Returns:
        every UnweightedGroundRule in this store

      • getGroundRules

        Iterable<GroundRule> getGroundRules(Rule rule)
        Returns every GroundRule that was instantiated by a given Rule.
        Parameters:
        rule - the Rule of the GroundRules to return
        Returns:
        the Rule's GroundRules

      • size

        int size()
        Returns:
        the number of GroundRules in this store

      • count

        int count(Rule rule)
        Returns:
        the number of GroundRules for a specific rule in this store
